items.title: WATCH:  ‘American Idol’ contestant hits high note
items.description: Season 24 of "American Idol" premiered last night and the performances wowed returning judges Carrie Underwood, Luke Bryan and Lionel Richie.

items.title: Minneapolis live updates: It 'all goes away' if state gives up criminals, Trump says
items.description: A 37-year-old Minneapolis man was killed after he was shot by a federal agent, the police.

items.title: Winter storm live updates: 220 million Americans on alert for extreme cold
items.description: A massive winter storm that stretches 2,000 miles has knocked out power to hundreds of thousands of people.

items.title: San Francisco issues warning as mountain lion roams city streets
items.description: A young mountain lion has been spotted prowling the streets of downtown San Francisco as officials have warned people in the area to take caution.

items.title: WATCH:  Volunteer dog walker never misses a day, even in the snow
items.description: ABC News' Danny New introduces us to a Maryland man whose work at an animal shelter are, in his words, “cheaper than therapy,” even in snowy weather.
